name: Hidden Critters Quiz | Hidden Words by Theme | 10 Questions

questions.text: What kind of cow is an expression of anger?
What kind of pig is a water tap?
What kind of emu is a copy or imitation?
What kind of ape is a laceration you may get in the copy room?
What kind of coot do small children ride?
What kind of fish is aloof?
What kind of gull is easy to fool?
What kind of crow is usually found in the kitchen, cooking things quickly?
What kind of hog is a Japanese ruler?
To close, a hard one! What kind of stag is a rapid, involuntary movement of the eye?
questions.explanation:
Nystagmus.

	Nystagmus can be a symptom of some neurological disorders.
